com.intel.fightclub.dialog.observer

Class BatteryObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.dialog.observer.EventObserver<BatteryObserver.AggregateBatteryClassification>
      • com.intel.fightclub.dialog.observer.BatteryObserver

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class BatteryObserver
extends EventObserver<BatteryObserver.AggregateBatteryClassification>
    Listens to battery events in the way Android recommends it, which is listening to Intent.ACTION_BATTERY_LOW and Intent.ACTION_BATTERY_OKAY events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  BatteryObserver.AggregateBatteryClassification
      POJO for tracking BatteryLevelEvent.BatteryStateClassification for both mobile and wearable device types, to be used as this Observer's observable type.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        @NonNull
public static BatteryObserver newInstance(@NonNull
                                                   android.content.Context context,
                                                   @NonNull
                                                   android.os.Looper looper)
        Factory method for creating BatteryObserver instances. This method initializes the observer using the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        A new instance of a phone batter observer, ready to be notified of low battery events.

      • doInitialize

        @Nullable
protected Registration doInitialize(@NonNull
                                              android.content.Context context)
        Description copied from class: EventObserver
        Allows subclasses to define behavior that will take place whenever EventObserver.initialize(Context) is invoked. Initializer call to prevent the off chance that we get listener events prior to the Observer instance being constructed.
        Specified by:
        doInitialize in class EventObserver<BatteryObserver.AggregateBatteryClassification>
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.
        Returns:
        An optional Registration, to be used for unregistering from events in EventObserver.destroy(Context).

      • doDestroy

        protected void doDestroy(@NonNull
                         android.content.Context context)
        Description copied from class: EventObserver
        Allows subclasses to define behavior that will take place whenever EventObserver.destroy(Context) is invoked. This is a thread-safe call, synchronized by the superclass using a lock.
        Specified by:
        doDestroy in class EventObserver<BatteryObserver.AggregateBatteryClassification>
        Parameters:
        context - Application context.

      • batteryStatusUpdate

        public void batteryStatusUpdate(@NonNull
                                DeviceType deviceType,
                                int updatedBatteryLevel)
        Update battery status for a certain device type and determine whether dialogue should be notified of any changes. This method updates the observer's observable state.
        Parameters:
        deviceType - The type of device for which a battery level update was registered.
        updatedBatteryLevel - The newly detected battery level.
